post.body: LMAO @ Dahl and the flamethrower. Icing my bottom...I think I cracked it when I wiped out on the ice haha.
I seriously despise sick people...they whine alot. Maybe I should be thinking about a career change...
Mark Czerniec, I got something for ya....filo-wrapped asparagus with lamb. Boo-Yah.
Steve Dahl on Comcast with Peanut Butter-gotta go watch it. Wonder what Mark Czerniec is cooking next...me hungry.
I can't handle dell.com. does that make me "special?"
STILL waiting to see if Chris is coming to Chi with us Fri night. Preparing myself to go downtown Tues for Tree Lighting-anyone wanna come?
Seriously, I hate being sick. Didn't help that I saw Lou Canellis last night on 190 North....he was sweaty-a bit on a sweat lodge....ewww
Sitting at home, party in Schaumburg tmrw.Chris Tuesday day after Thanksgiving -tree lighting in Chicago then Greektown.
WHO THE HELL IS JOE THE PLUMBER?!?!?!? fLOSSMOOR sTATION fRI NIGHT, sCHAUMBURG sAT ALL DAY, sHAN'S BABY SHOWER sUN. wISH ME LUCK MIN
This debate is causing me cranial hemorrhaging. Off to bed, work in the AM. Off this weekend...what to do...?
I have a follower. Rock on Mark Czerniec! Now to change my picture....
